title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 207.1 - The depository trust company
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 207.1 - The depository trust company

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby grants permission for present and
future executive officers of banks, trust companies, bank holding companies, foreign banking corporations maintaining branches in this State and national
banks located in this State to serve at the same time as directors or members
of committees authorized by the board of directors, or both, of The Depository

Trust &Clearing Corporation and its subsidiaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
207.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
